verbs.description: [ARG1: Trump] [ARGM-ADV: also] [V: became] [ARG2: the first president in 15 years not to hold an end - of - the - year press conference before heading out of town for the holidays] .
Trump also became [ARG0: the first president in 15 years] [ARGM-NEG: not] to [V: hold] [ARG1: an end - of - the - year press conference] [ARGM-TMP: before heading out of town for the holidays] .
[ARG0: Trump] also became the first president in 15 years not to hold an end - of - the - year press conference before [V: heading] [ARG1: out of town] [ARGM-PRP: for the holidays] .
